Articles.Content:
..Why hasnt that SESAU Mod been shown on the forums?!

It has, here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55835-Kmp-0-22-wip-alpha

Uh i think someone else has beaten you to it. link

I am just trying to make a collaboration between him and us... let's see...

KMP works in a different way than LOG, as far as I understand.

Still, having a merge of the two would be amazing.

KMP works in a different way than LOG, as far as I understand.

Still, having a merge of the two would be amazing.

Yes. He has got the ingame knowledge, and we the server and client knowledge. It would become a really good mod...
any progress? plans to do?
I can help testing, I'm in the same timezone as germany (Sweden, no idea what timezome)
Just wanted to bump up so more people can see!
If you can help Kmp fix the 50 bugs they have, that would be amazing. Perfect MP.
Well, I'd prefer him to keep working on this. The concept seems way more solid.
When will we get an alpha release?
Don't ask for ETA's, though it is tempting.. Either he has other stuff to do, or he is planning evil villain things..
or this multiplayer project dies.

or this multiplayer project dies.

No! This wont happen! I do not accept this to happen.
So, any news?

So, any news?

Well, nothing to show, but i am making part list equalizing and more that 2 players possible at moment. This will take some time becouse i have access to my computer only for 1-1.5h per day, since my parents think that computers wither your brains away.

your parents obviously have not heard of the immense potential that computers and the internet have.

They also don't know that lcd screens aren't black magic used by the govt to control our minds.
you should show your parents KSP
They like KSP, but what they say is that games and computers ruin your imagination.

They like KSP, but what they say is that games and computers ruin your imagination.

...

They like KSP, but what they say is that games and computers ruin your imagination.

Sorry to rag on your parents but the work you are doing right now is absolutely not going to ruin your imagination or your brain. Both programming and KSP's general focus encourage problem solving and critical thinking. There's a big difference between sitting in front of a computer and playing COD or WoW all day and making something with your own thought processes that will benefit other people (to some degree at least). You're doing more for your own mental growth and health by working on this project and playing KSP. Keep it up and hopefully one day your parents will be a little more understanding of that
This mod seems to have been overshadowed by KMP (because it came out first), but I still want to see the comparison between the two. Mainly because I can't get KMP to work properly.

It is indeed very important that there are alternatives to KMP. Each will have its own benefits, and more importantly: problems.

In the end they may learn from each other and/or combine to bring forth the best multiplayer experience.
I very much hope this comes out. Kmp has bugs left and right, even corrupting 2 of my save files non-kmp. LOG looks MUCH better
Please do continue this mod. KMP doesn't serve what I want
KMP is terrible it never works and disconnects every 5 minutes !! I Want this!!!
